item.title: FT Most Read: Friday, September 20, 2024 at 10:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. ‘Big Short’ fund manager Eisman put on ‘indefinite leave’ after Gaza comments
2. [Opinion] Young women are starting to leave men behind
3. Israel kills elite Hizbollah commanders in Beirut strike, IDF says
4. Amazon says workers need to be in the office. Most of Silicon Valley disagrees.
5. UK economic gloom intensifies as borrowing overshoots
item.guid: FT Most Read: Friday, September 20, 2024 at 10:15 PM UTC
